title: Web Developer
description: Deskripsi PekerjaanMengembangkan aplikasi berbasis webMenemukan dan memperbaiki bug dan melakukan pemrogramanPersyaratanMinimal pendidikan D3 jurusan Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Ilmu Komputer dan jurusan lain yang relavanMemiliki komunikasi yang baik dan keterampilan interpersonal yang baikMemiliki motivasi untuk mempelajari teknologi baru Dapat bekerja secara mandiri dan bekerja sama dalam timMemiliki kemampuan pemrograman .Net/PHP/Javascript

title: Front End Developer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using React.js, including integration with backend APIs.Optimize application performance to be fast, responsive, and user-friendly.Contribute to architecture and best practices in frontend development.Implement UI/UX that is in accordance with the design of the design team.Ensure web applications are compatible across browsers and devices.Assist in debugging and troubleshooting when there are issues in the frontend system.Work closely with the backend team to ensure smooth system integration.Minimum QualificationsCandidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science or Information Technology, Engineering (Computer or Telecommunication) or equivalentMinimum 1 year of experience in frontend development with React.js.Proficient in JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, or Styled Components.Experience with state management such as Redux, Zustand, or React Context API.Understanding SSR & SSG with Next.js is a plus.Experience in REST or GraphQL API integration.Able to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code.Able to work in a team and have good communication.

title: Web Developer
description: ResponsibilitiesAnalyse, design and develop an apps based on customer, business and Bank's operational needs.Perform system testing, both unit tests and system integration tests, to ensure that the application can be used and connected to other required systems.Monitor and maintain apps performance and enhancement to suit the needs of customers, business, and the Bank's operations.Develop and manage documentation related to apps development.RequirementsAt least 2-3 years of Web Developer experience using TypeScript, React.js, and Next.js.Proficiency in React.js and Next.js is required.Good understanding of micro frontend architecture.Additional experience with client-side tools like React Query, Redux is preferred.Knowledge of infrastructure like Docker and Kubernetes.Familiar with Java and Spring Boot.Good communication and collaboration skill.Good understanding of software security.Able to do code testing, bug troubleshooting, and provide application support.Updated on technological developments.Preferred Experience in Banking Industry.Our office location:PT BANK DIGITAL BCAPlaza MutiaraKuningan, Kuningan Tim., Kecamatan Setiabudi, Kota Jakarta SelatanDKI JakartaWe perform WFO/WFH policy, so you will be required to come to the office at times.

title: Internship Web Developer
description: DESKRIPSI PEKERJAANMendukung pengembangan situs web berdasarkan kebutuhan bisnis.Mendukung pengembangan dan penyelesaian pengembangan web sesuai dengan jadwal yang telah ditetapkan.Membantu dalam penyusunan dokumen terkait pengembangan web (spesifikasi teknis, skenario dan hasil pengujian, serta panduan pengguna).
